Uses of Interface
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest.FileDigester

Packages that use FileDigester
Package Description
net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest
Classes for calculating files digests.

  • Uses of FileDigester in net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest

    Classes in net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest that implement FileDigester
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AbstractFileDigester
    Base class for implementations of FileDigester.
    class  CksumFileDigester
    Implementation of FileDigester for the POSIX 1003.2 CRC algorithm (32 bits).
    class  CRC32FileDigester
    Implementation of FileDigester for the CRC32 algorithm.
    class  MessageDigestFileDigester
    An implementation of FileDigester that streams the content of files to a MessageDigest.
    Fields in net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest with type parameters of type FileDigester
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected Map<String,​FileDigester> DigesterFactory.digesters
    The map (algorithm, digester).
    Methods in net.nicoulaj.maven.plugins.checksum.digest that return FileDigester
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    FileDigester DigesterFactory.getFileDigester​(String algorithm)
    Get an instance of FileDigester for the given checksum algorithm.
